column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We arrived and had to wait about 30 min
column2: but they were nice enough to take our order while we waited
column3: so we didn't have to wait too long after we were seated to eat - Score!   Street parking is difficult
column5: or find a local lot.  Atmosphere is nice
column6: they have a couple of different rooms with booths and regular tables.  Service is always pretty good here.
